headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Names Riyadh-Based Managing Director for Middle East and North Africa
summary: RIYADH, Saudi Arabia, November 09, 2025--Teledyne FLIR Defense, part of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), announced that it has appointed Tarik Solomon as managing director for the Middle East and North Africa (MENA). Based in Riyadh, Solomon will oversee the company’s regional growth strategy, partnerships, and localization initiatives across defense, industrial, and emerging technology sectors. He will report to Dr. JihFen Lei, president of Teledyne FLIR Defense.
